sentences.en: Crystal chandeliers glittered brightly above them.
sentences.cn: 他们头顶的水晶吊灯闪闪发亮.

sentences.en: Even as the sun was shining brightly, it began to rain.
sentences.cn: 就在阳光灿烂的时候, 也下起雨来了.

sentences.en: He smiled brightly as Ben approached.
sentences.cn: 本走过来时，他脸上露出灿烂的笑容。

sentences.en: Her cigarette glowed brightly, then died.
sentences.cn: 她的香烟燃起一阵亮光，然后就熄灭了。

sentences.en: It was dark and a giant moon lit the road so brightly you could see the landscape clearly.
sentences.cn: 天黑了，一轮巨大的月亮把道路照得通明，周围的景物可以看得一清二楚。

sentences.en: Orange flags stand out brightly, set against the blue sky.
sentences.cn: 橘黄色的旗在蓝天的映衬下显得分外鲜艳.

sentences.en: Sometimes the people doing this dance hold brightly colored scarves.
sentences.cn: 有时跳这种舞的人会手拿色彩鲜艳的丝巾。

sentences.en: The banquet was held in the brightly - lit Great Hall of the People.
sentences.cn: 宴会在灯火辉煌的人民大会堂举行.

sentences.en: The brightly-coloured boats ply between the islands.
sentences.cn: 色彩明艳的船只往来于岛屿之间。

sentences.en: The dress had been brightly coloured, but it was stained and dirty now.
sentences.cn: 那件连衣裙原来色彩非常鲜艳，不过现在有污渍变脏了。

sentences.en: The moon was a brightly shining crescent.
sentences.cn: 那晚的月亮是一弯闪闪发亮的新月.

sentences.en: The public square is as brightly lit as in daylight.
sentences.cn: 广场上灯火辉煌,如同白昼.
